    • Method Detail

      • getRegexForDisplay

        public static String getRegexForDisplay(String regex)
        Modifies the regex Expression to show it the user with the characters which are allowed.
        Parameters:
        regex - Regex to modify
        Returns:
        Regex without starting [ or ending ]* and without escaping characters

      • validateEmail

        public static boolean validateEmail(String fieldName,
                                    String input,
                                    boolean isRequired,
                                    org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
        Validate the e-mail address.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the field name.
        input - the input of the field.
        isRequired - true if the input must contain a value
        errors - the error object.
        Returns:
        true if the e-mail address is valid otherwise false

      • validatePasswords

        public static boolean validatePasswords(UserPasswordManagement userPasswordManagement,
                                        String passwordField,
                                        String passwordInput,
                                        String passwordConfirmField,
                                        String passwordConfirmInput,
                                        org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
        Parameters:
        userPasswordManagement - the user password management service
        passwordField - the name of the password field.
        passwordInput - the password.
        passwordConfirmField - the name of the field to confirm the password.
        passwordConfirmInput - the password confirmation
        errors - Errors.
        Returns:
        true if the password is valid otherwise false
        Since:
        3.5

      • validatePhoneNumber

        public static void validatePhoneNumber(PhoneNumber phoneNumber,
                                       String field,
                                       org.springframework.validation.Errors errors,
                                       boolean required)
        Validates a phone number.
        Parameters:
        phoneNumber - the phone number to validate
        field - the field to check
        errors - the erros
        required - If set, a number must be set, else a number can be set.

      • validatePortNumber

        public static boolean validatePortNumber(String fieldName,
                                         String input,
                                         boolean isRequired,
                                         org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
        Validate port numbers. Checks if the input consists only of digits and if the number is a value between 0 and 65535.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the field name.
        input - the input of the field.
        isRequired - true if the input must contain a value
        errors - the error object.
        Returns:
        true if the port number is valid otherwise false

      • validateString

        public static void validateString(String field,
                                  org.springframework.validation.Errors errors,
                                  String pattern,
                                  int minLength,
                                  int maxLength)
        Validates a string.
        Parameters:
        field - the field
        errors - the errors
        pattern - The regular expression to use.
        minLength - Minimal length of the field.
        maxLength - Maximal length of the field.

      • validateString

        public static boolean validateString(String fieldName,
                                     String input,
                                     boolean isRequired,
                                     int maxLen,
                                     int minLen,
                                     String regex,
                                     org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
        Validates a string.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the field name.
        input - the input of the field.
        isRequired - true if the input must contain a value
        maxLen - the max length of chars, can be a negative number to skip this test
        minLen - the minimum length of chars, can be zero to skip this test
        regex - A regular expression for the given string, can be null to skip this test
        errors - the error object (reference to a BindException object).
        Returns:
        true if the string is valid otherwise false

      • validateStringByRegex

        public static String validateStringByRegex(String inputStr,
                                           String regex,
                                           String field,
                                           org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
        Validates a string by regular expression.
        Parameters:
        inputStr - String
        regex - A regular expression for the given string, can be null
        field - the field name (may be null or empty String)
        errors - Reference to a BindException object. If this parameter null then field will be not rejected
        Returns:
        Returns the message property (error code) or null
